synopsis.text: After a scandal forces Ai Narata out of the idol industry, she seeks refuge in the prestigious Kouka School of Musical and Theatrical Arts, an all-female institution renowned for producing top-tier actresses who excel in both male and female roles. Ai, a natural fit for female roles due to her idol background, struggles to connect with her classmates because of her distant demeanor. Meanwhile, Sarasa Watanabe, a tall and lively country girl, aspires to play the male lead role of Oscar in the Kouka acting troupe. Despite her social awkwardness, Sarasa forms an unexpected bond with Ai, her new roommate. Together, they navigate the challenges of the competitive theater world, where talent alone isn't enough to succeed. As they strive to make their mark on the stage, they must confront jealousy, deceit, and the harsh realities of show business. Will their shared passion for performance be enough to propel them to the top of the Kouka School and secure their place in the spotlight?
